data.message: So I keep hearing about this rap battle that Drake has supposibly called out Slim Shady? Is he crazy? He'd have better luck at making a baby. With Bruce Jenner as a lady. Like a biscuit with some gravy. Hazy and dumbfounded. Shut up Drake, go to your room. Your grounded. He started out as a cripple on DeGrassi. Now taking stabs at Em when you know who the boss be. Now lastly but surely let me save you the humiliation. Didn't you hear about Rap God and all its devastation. It put grown men to bed and changed the game forever. Drake your a has been......I mean nobody...whatever.
